Title: Exempts certain veterans service organizations from taxes on the sales of beer, wine and soda
Summary: Exempts certain veterans service organizations from taxes on the sales of beer, wine and soda.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting certain veterans service organizations from taxes on the sales of beer, wine and soda
